company_command.name: Company Command
company_command.description: A higher-ranking field officer trained to command more units and occasionally direct field operations.

platoon_command.name: Platoon Command
platoon_command.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

veteran_platoon_command.name: Veteran Platoon Command
veteran_platoon_command.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

forward_artillery_observer.name: Forward Artillery Observer
forward_artillery_observer.description: An artillery forward observer able to call in a fire mission.

field_medic.name: Field Medic
field_medic.description: A trained field medic used to treat the wounded near the frontline.

brazil_riflemen.name: Infantaria Squad
brazil_riflemen.description: A group of trained Brazilian infantry

b_scout_squad.name: Scout Squad
b_scout_squad.description: Foot infantry used for recon on food and quick scouting of the objective.

flamethrower_team.name: Flamethrower Team
flamethrower_team.description: A team equipped to clear bunkers and other defensive positions.

sniper_team.name: Sniper Team
sniper_team.description: A team equipped to take out important targets from a distance.

bazooka_team.name: Bazooka Team
bazooka_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

veteran_bazooka_team.name: Veteran Bazooka Team
veteran_bazooka_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

b_light_mortar_team.name: Light 60mm Mortar Team
b_light_mortar_team.description: A light 60mm mortar carried by a small team.

b_medium_mortar_team.name: Medium 80mm Mortar Team
b_medium_mortar_team.description: A medium mortar carried by a small team.

b_heavy_mortar_team.name: Heavy 120mm Mortar Team
b_heavy_mortar_team.description: A heavy mortar carried by a small team.

m16_rocket_launcher.name: M16 Rocket Launcher
m16_rocket_launcher.description: A wheeled light rocket artillery piece.

b_m8_greyhound.name: M8 Greyhound
b_m8_greyhound.description: An armored recon car with a light tank killing gun.

b_m20_scout_car.name: M20 Scout Car
b_m20_scout_car.description: An armored recon car with a heavy MG for infantry support.

m8_scott.name: M8 Scott
m8_scott.description: A light tank with a turret howitzer for light infantry support.

b_m3_stuart.name: M3 Stuart
b_m3_stuart.description: A light tank with a decent AT gun.

b_m4_sherman.name: M4 Sherman
b_m4_sherman.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

m4_sherman_command.name: M4 Sherman (Command)
m4_sherman_command.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

b_m4a1_sherman.name: M4A1 Sherman
b_m4a1_sherman.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

m4a1_sherman_command.name: M4A1 Sherman (Command)
m4a1_sherman_command.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

b_m10_tank_destroyer.name: M10 Tank Destroyer
b_m10_tank_destroyer.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

m7_priest.name: M7 Priest
m7_priest.description: A later war infantry support medium tank.

m17_mgmc.name: M17 MGMC
m17_mgmc.description: An armored halftrack upgraded with several anti-air machine-guns.

m3_white_scout.name: M3 White Scout Car
m3_white_scout.description: A lightly armored scout transport car.

waco_glider.name: Waco CG-4A Glider
waco_glider.description: A lightweight glider used to transport troops to the battlefield.

p51_mustang.name: P-51 Mustang
p51_mustang.description: An air to air fighter plane.

p47_thunderbolt.name: P-47D-40 Thunderbolt
p47_thunderbolt.description: An air to air fighter plane.

foxhole poets.name: Foxhole Poets
foxhole poets.flavor: The Brazilian Expedition Force spent a lot of time in foxholes and trenches, to the point that a portion of their newspaper was named 'Foxhole Poets'
foxhole poets.description: Use when an Infantry is targetted by an attack. That unit is treated as being in Light Cover, or Hard Cover if already in Light Cover.

ea_cobra_fumou!.name: E A Cobra Fumou!
ea_cobra_fumou!.description: Use when activating a unit. That unit gets +1 Courage.
ea_cobra_fumou!.flavor: The men sent by Brazil weren't many, but they were among the best of their best and these men took great pride in the motto, badge, and culture of the 'Smoking Cobra' First Expeditionary Division
